subject: VAJ3.5 and JUnit3.4 HowTo?
msgSnippet: Hi, somehow it seems I am to stupid to set up JUnit3.4 with VAJ3.5. Has anybody done it allready and can give detailed instructions of how to do it? I really
messageBody:
Hi,

somehow it seems I am to stupid to set up JUnit3.4 with VAJ3.5.
Has anybody done it allready and can give detailed instructions of
how to do it? I really would reward her/him with as much Ferrari
Testarossa as she/he is able to carry with one hand.

Thnx a lot,

Werner
